heading: HR00136
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE SUDDEN PRICE SPIKE OF ELECTRICITY AT THE WHOLESALE ELECTRICITY SPOT MARKET (WESM) THAT REACHED TWENTY PESOS (P20.00) PER KILOWATT-HOUR (kWh) DURING ANOTHER SERIES OF SUSPICIOUS SIMULTANEOUS EMERGENCY AND SCHEDULED SHUTDOWNS OF POWER PLANTS BY GENERATION COMPANIES, AND DETERMINE THE STATUS OF THE POWER SUPPLY IN LUZON, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT MEASURES BE IMMEDIATELY ENFORCED TO PREVENT AND STOP YET ANOTHER POWER PLAY BY GENERATION COMPANIES AND PROTECT CONSUMERS AGAINST THE SAME
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00136
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE SUDDEN PRICE SPIKE OF ELECTRICITY AT THE WHOLESALE ELECTRICITY SPOT MARKET (WESM) THAT REACHED TWENTY PESOS (P20.00) PER KILOWATT-HOUR (kWh) DURING ANOTHER SERIES OF SUSPICIOUS SIMULTANEOUS EMERGENCY AND SCHEDULED SHUTDOWNS OF POWER PLANTS BY GENERATION COMPANIES, AND DETERMINE THE STATUS OF THE POWER SUPPLY IN LUZON, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT MEASURES BE IMMEDIATELY ENFORCED TO PREVENT AND STOP YET ANOTHER POWER PLAY BY GENERATION COMPANIES AND PROTECT CONSUMERS AGAINST THE SAME
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-06
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-09;
